content:
About Me Hi 👋!
My name is Leandro and I’m from 🇧🇷 Curitiba, Brazil. I’m a Software Engineer with 7 years of experience in the field with a focus on mobile development.
👨🏻‍💻 I’m currently working at Cheesecake Labs as a Senior Software Engineer. 🎓 I’m graduated in Bachelor of Information Systems and Technology at UTFPR. Technologies and a bit of everything else...
